overview: Pop sensation Katy Pervy knows what sells her music: sex! Well, that and a sexy voice that could only get that way via daily deep throat vocal exercises. So, Katy Pervy goes on a XXX adventure, from her cleavage filled appearance with everybody's favourite red puppet, Elmar, to kissing a girl and liking it so much that it evolves into a hot & heavy lesbian party!  Featuring parodies of all of Katy Pervy's famous horny friends, Ka$$a, Rihandjob, Lady Gagger, Snoop Dong, and Russell Gland, as they fuck their way up the charts!
title: Katy Pervy: The XXX Parody
